verbs.description: [ARG1: artillery shell] [V: discovered] [ARGM-LOC: at cohoes fire scene] the discovery of an artillery shell on one of the lots where a building burned down during december massive downtown fire forced emergency workers to close several local streets the shell was found by workers digging in a remsen street lot where one of the building gutted by the fire once stood shell columbia john a gomes arson cohoes new york endangerment marra artillery
